scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:background && npm run build:widget && npm run build:content && npm run build:popup && npm run build:options && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:background: tsc --project tsconfig.background.json && esbuild background/background.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/background/background.js --format=esm --platform=browser --target=es2020 --external:chrome --banner:js='/* Assist Extension Background */'
scripts.build:content: tsc --project tsconfig.content.json && esbuild content/content.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/content/content.js --format=iife --platform=browser --target=es2020 --external:react --external:react-dom --external:chrome --banner:js='/* Assist Extension Content Script */'
scripts.copy:assets: mkdir -p dist/assets/icons dist/content && cp content/styles.css dist/content/styles.css 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../extension.zip . ../manifest.json
